com.compomics.util.experiment.identification.psm_scoring.psm_scores

Class ComplementarityScore

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.compomics.util.experiment.identification.psm_scoring.psm_scores.ComplementarityScore

  • public class ComplementarityScore
extends Object
    The intensity sub-score as adapted from the DirecTag manuscript (http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/18630943).
    Author:
    Marc Vaudel

      Scores the match between the given peptide and spectrum using the complementarity of the matched peaks.

    • Method Detail

      • getScore

        public double getScore(Peptide peptide,
                       MSnSpectrum spectrum,
                       AnnotationSettings annotationPreferences,
                       SpecificAnnotationSettings specificAnnotationPreferences,
                       PeptideSpectrumAnnotator peptideSpectrumAnnotator)
                throws InterruptedException,
                       org.apache.commons.math.MathException
        Scores the match between the given peptide and spectrum using the complementarity of the matched peaks. For every residue, a list of matched peaks is established and if any is found, the score per residue is the log of the number of matched ions. The peptide score is the average of the residue scores.
        Parameters:
        peptide - the peptide of interest
        spectrum - the spectrum of interest
        annotationPreferences - the general spectrum annotation preferences
        specificAnnotationPreferences - the annotation preferences specific to this psm
        peptideSpectrumAnnotator - the spectrum annotator to use
        Returns:
        the score of the match
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - exception thrown if the thread is interrupted
        org.apache.commons.math.MathException - exception thrown if a math exception occurred when estimating the noise level
